channel.title: Whonix 9 very early alpha builds
channel.description:
Getting closer to Whonix 9. Currently released as tag 8.6.1.7. Available only here until there is something for wider testing: https://github.com/adrelanos/nothing-to-see
Perhaps useful for development.
- sdwdate (specifically sclockadj) still broken. - timesync (sdwdate gui) still broken. - build seems to work stable - upgrade from Whonix 8 not possible yet (might be implemented into whonix-legacy package) - largely untested - not sure if worth to take bug reports yet, i plan on testing the functionality of every package one by one and guess will spot most things then

item.title: Whonix 9 very early alpha builds
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Getting closer to Whonix 9. Currently released as tag 8.6.1.7. Available only here until there is something for wider testing:

GitHub

adrelanos/nothing-to-see

Temporary Git Tags for Whonix. Contribute to adrelanos/nothing-to-see development by creating an account on GitHub.

Perhaps useful for development.

  • sdwdate (specifically sclockadj) still broken.
  • timesync (sdwdate gui) still broken.
  • build seems to work stable
  • upgrade from Whonix 8 not possible yet (might be implemented into whonix-legacy package)
  • largely untested
  • not sure if worth to take bug reports yet, i plan on testing the functionality of every package one by one and guess will spot most things then

Read full topic
